name: YouTube - Cards
description:
DARK VERSION RELEASED!
Just makes things pop out more.
Making nearly everything have its own box-shadow and background different from the body.
I am working on a dark version.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: Updates: V1.12 (June 2nd, 2017): Dark Version - Small fixes to playlists, change language(country) and channel pages. V1.11 (May 28th, 2017): Dark version - Fixed upload page. - Changed subscribed to blue. If you want an option for red or any other colour, just ask. :) - Minor fixes to channel pages. V1.1 (May 27th, 2017): - Released DARK version. (Dark version is also a W.I.P, please be patient) - Minor changes to LIGHT version. V1.0 (March 18th, 2017) : - Initial release. ( This is W.I.P. Expect bugs )
